description:
Get a grip and drop in. If you like a slim grip, then these grippy lock-on grips will keep you connected as you shred your favourite trails.

  • Dual texture, with grippy knurled surface under your palm and wide rectangular ridges under your fingers
  • Dual density rubber dampens vibration and improves durability
  • Ergonomic flare sits comfortably in your hand
  • Outside diameter is 32mm
  • Length is 135mm
  • Single aluminum clamp ring and closed end, so no need for plugs
name: MEC Lock-on Grips
